offer_text: Attract more customers with exclusive offers! Define yours today and boost your restaurant's visibility.

good_job: ğŸ‘ Your offer is live! Be ready to respond to booking requests and encourage diners to leave comments in the app. Positive feedback helps attract more customers and boosts your restaurant's reputation.
